name: International Cricket Captain III
overview: International Cricket Captain III (ICCIII) is the ultimate cricket management game for 2007. It has everything you could affect as a captain: from team selection, coaching, nurturing young talent and making the vital decisions in the match can make the difference between a great winning team and a disastrous season. ICCIII features a brand new 3D game engine with fully motion-captured animations and new telly-style display so players can watch the match as well as captain it. The database it right up to date at the time of release, featuring each player for the current season, last season and career for Test Matches, first class, ODI's, List A limited overs and T20 cricket. Match modes include Exhibition, County and International Career, World Cup Series and Multiplayer, in which two players can play offline and challenge thousands of teams online for the ultimate in cricketing glory. There's a full range of 60+ classic strokes and aggressive slogs covering the full range of the shots: stops, sweeps, drives, cuts, hooks and the rest. Realistic ball dynamics accurately simulate bowler speeds, spin and swing, and the Ball Tracker Camera can capture the flight, pitch and style of bowler.
